siteDescription: Tales and bedtime stories using AI
homePageDescription: Discover unique AI-generated bedtime stories and tales on ImagiBook.ai
bookCreation_description: Create your own story with our AI
storyTitlePlaceholder: Enter the title of your story
mainCharacterPlaceholder: Enter the name of the main character
creationMode_magicWand_description: Effortlessly create enchanting tales with our AI storyteller. Perfect for quick, magical narratives.
creationMode_storybookStudio_description: Your personal writer's workshop to craft and fine-tune rich, detailed stories. Ideal for hands-on creators.
characters_description: Please provide a name and (optional) description of the main characters in your story.
characters_errors_nameRequired: Name is required and must contain at least two letters.
characters_errors_atLeastOne: At least one character is required
storyOverview_label: Story Overview: Set the Scene for Your Tale
storyOverview_placeholder:
- Noah receives a new bike as a present from his grandma
- Dad offers to teach Noah how to ride
- Noah feels scared at first
- With practice, Noah succeeds in riding the bike
- Noah has a lot of fun playing with his new bike
- He grows to love his new gift 
 - Make the story so it ends with Noah thanking grandma for his present.
storyOverview_errors_maxLength: Story Overview must not exceed 100 characters.
step3_description: Provide a brief overview of your story to set the scene.
illustrationData_disneyStyle_description: Charming and whimsical illustrations inspired by Disney, bringing characters to life with expressive features and a magical atmosphere.
illustrationData_aquarelle_description: Soft and fluid watercolor illustrations that create a dreamy and delicate visual experience for young readers.
illustrationData_storybookIllustration_d: Classic and enchanting illustrations reminiscent of traditional children's books, evoking a sense of nostalgia and wonder.
illustrationData_pixarStyle_description: Richly detailed illustrations with vibrant colors, lifelike textures, and expressive characters, providing a captivating visual experience.
illustrationData_manga_description: Dynamic and stylized illustrations with bold lines, expressive characters, and a dramatic sense of storytelling, inspired by classic manga art.
illustrationData_flatDesign_description: Modern and minimalist illustrations with bold colors and simple shapes, offering a clean and playful visual style.
illustration_description: The animation will reflect through all  images in the story
